body_html: Just a heads up, I'm pretty sure LOG(FATAL) will not produce a stack trace unfortunately. (This works inside of Google. It would be great if someone implemented an open-source version, I think there are already open-source utilities/examples that do this in other projects.) I suggest using gdb to get a stacktrace, although I'm not sure the stack will help you much, since the dead tensor has already been propagated.

body: Just a heads up, I'm pretty sure LOG(FATAL) will **not** produce a stack trace unfortunately. (This works inside of Google. It would be great if someone implemented an open-source version, I think there are already open-source utilities/examples that do this in other projects.) I suggest using gdb to get a stacktrace, although I'm not sure the stack will help you much, since the dead tensor has already been propagated.
